mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOTELS(address_id, owner_id, business_name, business_number, phone_number, intro, main_image, total_score, review_count) VALUES (#{addressId}, #{ownerId}, #{businessName}, #{businessNumber}, #{phoneNumber}, #{intro}, #{mainImage}, #{totalScore}, #{reviewCount})
mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.business_name, h.business_number, h.phone_number, h.intro, h.main_image, CASE WHEN h.review_count = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(h.total_score / h.review_count, 2) END AS avg_score, h.review_count, a.full_address FROM HOTELS h JOIN ADDRESSES a ON h.address_id = a.id WHERE h.owner_id = #{ownerId} ORDER BY h.id
SELECT id, address_id, owner_id, business_name, business_number, phone_number, intro, main_image, total_score, review_count FROM HOTELS WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE HOTELS SET address_id = #{addressId}, business_name = #{businessName}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, intro = #{intro}, main_image = #{mainImage} WHERE id = #{id}
